value:
This is the land called Askr, then.
It is full of kindness. I do not belong.

Dökkálfheimr is a realm of nightmare.
When people wake from nightmares,
they are usually relieved.$k$p"Just a dream," they say...

Our world exists only because people
have nightmares... Dökkálfheimr was
born from dreaming mortals...

There is a mortal I always dreamed
of killing. Such a dream must make
me despicable to you...

My name is Triandra. I am from the
nightmare realm and bring terror
care of $Nf.

Yes, I remember... I need power
to protect her...

Thank you. You are kinder than
I deserve.

I am Triandra. I come from the land
of your nightmares, and nightmares
are all I have to offer.

What were you like as a child?
Strong? Weak?$k$pI was weak, and I realized one truth:
A weak person can do nothing.$k$pKind and virtuous people are crushed
under the heel of the malicious.$k$pWithout strength, you cannot protect
what you care about. I had to do what
I did. For her. To protect her...$k$pI apologize for bringing this up so
suddenly. I'm not sure why I'm telling
you any of this in the first place...$k$pI suppose I want someone to know
me...someone to understand.
If it's a nightmare you want...
For mortals, nightmares are bitter, even painful... I'll never have the chance to make anyone happy...
I once had a sister I loved very much... Didn't I?
Cursed with a dökkálfr as an ally? Unlucky.
